name: Flourless Fudge Pumpkin Brownies
ingredients: 1/2 cup peanut butter or almond butter
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F and grease or line a baking dish with parchment paper
Add the pumpkin purée, peanut or almond butter, maple syrup, coconut sugar, eggs, baking soda, pumpkin spice, cocoa powder, salt, and vanilla extract to a large mixing bowl
Mix until smooth and well combined
Pour the batter into the prepared baking dish and spread evenly
Bake for 30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out mostly clean
Sprinkle with flaky salt if desired
